column2: ALPHA TO BRAVO. READY FOR EXTRACTION. COME TO PICK US UP. OVER.
ALPHA TO PAPA BEAR. TARGET IS DEAD. MISSION FAILED. REQUEST PERMISSION RETURN TO BASE. OVER.
ALPHA BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. WE HAVE SNATCHED THE OBJECTIVE. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR INSERTION. OVER.
GOOD LUCK ALPHA. GET THE BASTARD. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. GET READY FOR EXTRACTION. MAKE IT FAST. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. COPY ALPHA. RETURN TO BASE. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA BLACK. ROGER THAT. KEEP HIM SECURED. GET TO THE EXTRACT LZ. OVER.
PAPA BEAR TO ALPHA. WELCOME HOME. GOOD JOB OUT THERE. OVER.
